alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Reading Darwinist literature, one cannot help noticing the way in which each writer stresses his or her own orthodoxy and total fidelity to Darwin, much like bishops discussing the encyclicals of a pope."

- Denyse O'Leary, By Design or by Chance? Augsburg Fortress, 2004
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Widespread Expression of Total Fidelity to Darwin
